segments.text: What a beautiful watch . It goes very well with your ring .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not married yet . It's my engagement ring .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , congratulations . When is the big date ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you have the watch before getting the ring ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , we bought the ring together after I got the watch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You did a fabulous job with the selection . It's gorgeous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of watch is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you don't mind me asking , how much do they cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This one is $ 1500 . But they range from $ 600 to $ 3000 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's why it looks so nice . I should have figured . You always get what you pay for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I would rather get one nice watch instead of 20 mediocre ones .
segments.speaker: S2
